Source.Name: jbig2dec
Source.Summary: Decoder implementation of the JBIG2 image compression format.
Source.Description: jbig2dec is a decoder library and example utility implementing the JBIG2 bi-level image compression spec. Also known as ITU T.88 and ISO IEC 14492, and included by reference in Adobe's PDF version 1.4 and later.

Package.Name: jbig2dec
Package.Summary: Decoder implementation of the JBIG2 image compression format.
Package.Description: jbig2dec is a decoder library and example utility implementing the JBIG2 bi-level image compression spec. Also known as ITU T.88 and ISO IEC 14492, and included by reference in Adobe's PDF version 1.4 and later.
